text: so at the moment there's about a meter
of water in the garden with that amount
of water that house would definitely
flood so this the flood wall we built
which holds the water back and yeah it
seems to work we also built a flood gate
which you know most of the year but we
closed it and the problem is that the
water flows underneath the wall so then
we dug a sump here which is about a
metre deep and as you can see that's
that's actually filling with water as we
speak and there are some big pumps in
there that tripping automatically even
if we're not here which pump the water
back over the wall at the moment the
water is about two feet lower than it
it's been in the past in 2012 it was
higher than this and if the pumps had
failed then because I have to pump all
the time the house would definitely have
flooded so I'm really pleased that we
you know we've proved it works even
though you don't really want it to to
happen
